name: A Prologue Edition: Lovers Talk
description:
Femi visited Aisha the night before leaving. She stood, at some points nose to nose, brow to brow with him. This was unorthodox for any woman of the tribe but she did not care. Such a fiercely benevolent soul she was, and she did not shy from confrontation. Her heart was broken but she allowed anger to be her channel. 
He shouldn't be leaving.
The elders were working from fear and sending the young men away to defend a problem that was not theirs.
But Femi had no time for such discussion. Although he agreed deeply in every crevice of his being, he was a Warrior before he was a man. Emotion was pointless. 
The day he had worked his whole life for had apparently arrived early.
This was his call.
Aisha will have to wait. Though she will likely marry another. A coward maybe? He would shower her in gold if he returned but for today he was content with departing with tears.
They would dry.
The blood of his enemy however, would not have such a pleasure.
